Extensions/RequestError.html#/s:15Kitura.name: ormDatabaseNotInitialized
Extensions/RequestError.html#/s:15Kitura.abstract: Error when the Database has not been set

Extensions/RequestError.html#/s:15Kitura.name: ormCodableDecodingError
Extensions/RequestError.html#/s:15Kitura.abstract: Error when the TypeDecoder failed to extract the types from the model

Extensions/RequestError.html#/s:15Kitura.name: ormDatabaseDecodingError
Extensions/RequestError.html#/s:15Kitura.abstract: Error when the DatabaseDecoder could not construct a Model

Extensions/RequestError.html#/s:15Kitura.name: ormDatabaseEncodingError
Extensions/RequestError.html#/s:15Kitura.abstract: Error when the DatabaseEncoder could not decode a Model

Extensions/RequestError.html#/s:15Kitura.name: ormQueryError
Extensions/RequestError.html#/s:15Kitura.abstract: Error when the Query fails to be executed

Extensions/RequestError.html#/s:15Kitura.name: ormNotFound
Extensions/RequestError.html#/s:15Kitura.abstract: Error when the values retrieved from the database are nil

Extensions/RequestError.html#/s:15Kitura.name: ormInvalidTableDefinition
Extensions/RequestError.html#/s:15Kitura.abstract: Error when the table defined does not contain a specific column

Extensions/RequestError.html#/s:15Kitura.name: ormIdentifierError
Extensions/RequestError.html#/s:15Kitura.abstract: Error when the Identifier could not be constructed

Extensions/RequestError.html#/s:15Kitura.name: ormConnectionFailed
Extensions/RequestError.html#/s:15Kitura.abstract: Error when retrieving a connection from the database fails

Enums/DateEncodingFormat.html#/s:13Swift.name: double
Enums/DateEncodingFormat.html#/s:13Swift.abstract: double - This is the default encoding type and corresponds to Swifts encoding of Date.

Enums/DateEncodingFormat.html.name: DateEncodingFormat
Enums/DateEncodingFormat.html.abstract: The DateEncodingFormat enumeration defines the supported formats for persisiting properties of type Date.

Classes/DatabaseEncoder.html#/s:13SwiftK.name: encode(_:dateEncodingStrategy:)
Classes/DatabaseEncoder.html#/s:13SwiftK.abstract: Encode a Encodable type to a dictionary [String: Any]

Classes/DatabaseDecoder.html#/s:13SwiftK.name: decode(_:_:dateEncodingStrategy:)
Classes/DatabaseDecoder.html#/s:13SwiftK.abstract: Decode from a dictionary [String: Any] to a Decodable type

Classes/Database.html#/s:13SwiftKueryORM.name: DatabaseTask
Classes/Database.html#/s:13SwiftKueryORM.abstract: Definition of a DatabaseTask completion handler which accepts an optional Connection and optional Error

Classes/Database.html#/s:13SwiftKueryORM.name: init(single:)
Classes/Database.html#/s:13SwiftKueryORM.abstract: Create a Database instance which uses a single connection to perform each operation. The connection will remain open for the lifetime of the Database.

Classes/Database.html#/s:13SwiftKueryORM.name: init(_:)
Classes/Database.html#/s:13SwiftKueryORM.abstract: Create a Database instance with multiple connections, managed by a connection pool, allowing operations to be performed concurrently. These connections will remain open for the lifetime of the Database.

Classes/Database.html#/s:13SwiftKueryORM.name: init(generator:)
Classes/Database.html#/s:13SwiftKueryORM.abstract: Create a Database instance which uses short-lived connections that are generated on demand. A new Connection is created for every operation, and will be closed once the operation completes.

Classes/Database.html.name: Database
Classes/Database.html.abstract: Class defining the connection to the database.

Classes/DatabaseDecoder.html.name: DatabaseDecoder
Classes/DatabaseDecoder.html.abstract: Class used to construct a Model from a row in the database

Classes/DatabaseEncoder.html.name: DatabaseEncoder
Classes/DatabaseEncoder.html.abstract: Class used to construct a dictionary [String: Any] from a Model

Classes.html#/s:13SwiftKueryORM9TableInf.name: TableInfo
Classes.html#/s:13SwiftKueryORM9TableInf.abstract: Class caching the tables for the models of the application
